data.text: Navireke Nihuku no Wiittuwa, Amariamu Magidalena, Nasalome ni Amariamu anumwanaya Nayakhobo, nkayaathuma makhura o unukhelha o urwaa uhikacha iruttu ya Yesu.
Wichishuru nihuku no Jumaapili, nchuwa vaakhuma aya, nkayaarwaa unihiyeni.
Vaari aya mphironi ahokohanacha ashineneru, “Mpani nohalha unipirikishelha nlhuku nikhunelhiye vanihiyeni nne?”
Nansho vaawenhe aya, nkayoona wiira nlhuku nihopirikishiya vanlhakoni vawo. Nlhuku nno naari nulhupalhe chinene.
Paahi etu nkayaakelhacha nnihiyeni mmo, nkayaamwona mmirawo nawanre ikuwo chootelha twetwetwetwe nakhanlhe wiimonono, nkayaashangacha chinene.
Nansho mmirawo uyo nkaahimia wiira, “Nhishange. Kihochuwelha wiira nnomwaavia Yesu o Unazareti aakhomelhelhiye vansalaabani. Khaawo va, hohihimmwa! Mwooneke etu veeshiye awe.
Nrweeke etu mwaahimerieke owiittucha awe, vamoka ni Napeturo wiira ‘Nouholhelhani Ugalilaya, nnokoomwona wowo thoko chenre awe wo uhimia.’ ”
Paahi etu Napeturo nkayaakhuma unihiyeni waavithiye awe Yesu, nkayaattimakacha uno oovaka ni ushanga. Nkaamalha wo uhinhimeria ntu riyoothe ukhalhawaya yaari oovaka chinene.
Yesu vaahihimmwe awe, mapikoosha o nihuku no Jumaapili, echoninhe thoko wa Amariamu Magidalena akuminhe awe mashoka o unanara saba.
Amariamu Magidalena nkaarwa uwaahimeriani attu aari vamoka ni Yesu alhe. Yayo manyaattu ayo aari mu wunlhani,
veewilhe aya wiira Yesu hohihimmwa ni Amariamu Magidalena ahomwoona khayaarumelhenlhe.
Katashi miholho, Yesu nkaakhumelhelha owiittucha elhi awe ooniaka wo ikhove ikina vaari aya akelhaka iwani cho mmamatani.
Nkayaahokolhia ni waahimeria akhunanaya, nansho ni ayo khayaarumelhenlhe.

Kaanyuma Yesu nkaakhumelhelha owiittucha awe khumi ni mmoka vaalhia aya yolhia. Nkaachacheracha chinene wo nlhatu no ulhipa mirima, ukhalhawaya aari ahirumelhelhaka malhove a attu ankumanne vaahihimmwe awe.
Paahi nkeerelha onkhaye wiira, “Nrweeke velhaponi vonkhaye mwahimiacheke Malhove Orera wa attu onkhaye.
Ntu nohalha urumelhelha ni ubatiiziya nowoopolhiya, hinorumelhelha nohukumulhiya.
Attu anohalha urumelhelha ayo anovaahiya ikuru yo upangacha ithikineha, wo nchina naka anowa woomolha mashoka o unanara, ni wulhumacha nulhumo nilheto,
avaraka inwaa, ama awuriaka ittu iriyoothe yo uhapalha, khinowa yaahapalha. Anoweeshera areta miono ni ureta uyo unowaahiya, anoolhama.”
Paahi etu, Athithi Yesu vaamalhinhe aya wulhumacha ni owiittucha aya ayo, ahokushiya wiirimu, ukhanlhe aya wiimonono wa Nlhuku.

Owiittucha aya nkayaarwaacha ahimiachaka Malhove Orera ilhapo chonkhaye, Athithi nkaatamana vamoka aavahaka ikuru wo mitheko chonkhaye wo ukhomaalhiha malhove aarwaa vamoka ni mitheko cho ushangiha chaapangiya.
